//============================================================

prontera,147,169,5	script	Hugel Cat	10242,{
	mes "[^FF6600Hugel Cat^000000]";
	mes "Welcome to ^000088Hugel Mall^000000.";
	mes "Hello there ^FF0000" + strcharinfo(0) + "^000000.";
	mes	"I'm selling many Weaponry and stuffs from hugel mini games !";
	mes "Please select what you want.";
	next;
	switch(select("Armor:Dagger:1H-Sword:2H-Sword:Spear:Axe:Mace:Staff:Book:Katar:Knuckle:Bow:Whip:Instrument:Exit")) {
	case 1: callshop "MArmor", 1; end;
	case 2: callshop "MDagger", 1; end;
	case 3: callshop "M1H-Sword", 1; end;
	case 4: callshop "M2H-Sword", 1; end;
	case 5: callshop "MSpear", 1; end;
	case 6: callshop "MAxe", 1; end;
	case 7: callshop "MMace", 1; end;
	case 8: callshop "MStaff", 1; end;
	case 9: callshop "MBook", 1; end;
	case 10: callshop "MKatar", 1; end;
	case 11: callshop "MKnuckle", 1; end;
	case 12: callshop "MBow", 1; end;
	case 13: callshop "MWhip", 1; end;
	case 14: callshop "MInstrument", 1; end;
	case 15: end;
	}

}
//shops
-	shop	MArmor	-1,2319:5000000,2349:50000000,2351:50000000,2345:50000000,2347:50000000
-	shop	MDagger	-1,1238:15000000,1232:15000000,1235:15000000,1231:15000000,1228:15000000,1241:15000000,1242:15000000,13001:15000000,1233:15000000,1223:15000000,13002:15000000,1237:15000000,1230:15000000,1229:15000000,1225:15000000,1234:15000000,1236:15000000,1224:15000000,1227:15000000
-	shop	M1H-Sword	-1,1140:15000000,1134:15000000,1135:15000000,1132:15000000,1137:15000000,1133:15000000,1131:15000000,1141:15000000,1138:15000000,1130:15000000,1136:15000000,1148:15000000,1139:15000000
-	shop	M2H-Sword	-1,1166:15000000,1169:15000000,1170:15000000,1165:15000000,1164:15000000,1167:15000000,1168:15000000
-	shop	MSpear	-1,1467:15000000,1470:15000000,1415:15000000,1466:15000000,1474:15000000,1414:15000000,1413:15000000,1471:15000000,1469:15000000,1416:15000000,1468:15000000

//============================================================

prontera,147,166,5	script	Consumable Cat	10242,{
	mes "[^FF6600Consumable Cat^000000]";
	mes "Welcome to ^000088Consumable Mall^000000.";
	mes "Hello there ^FF0000" + strcharinfo(0) + "^000000.";
	mes	"I'm selling consumable and utility items !";
	mes "Please select what you want.";
	next;
	switch(select("Consumable list 1:Consumable list 2:Exit")) {
	case 1: callshop "idRO_conz",	1;	end;
	case 2:	callshop "idRO_conz2",	1;	end;
	case 3: end;
	}

}
-	shop	idROCO::idRO_conz	-1,505:10000,12217:20000,12218:20000,12202:40000,12203:40000,12204:40000,12205:40000,12206:40000,12207:40000,12913:50000,12914:50000,7621:50000,12350:75000,7776:100000,13532:100000,13535:100000,12375:100000,14616:100000,14617:100000,14618:100000,14619:100000,14620:100000,14621:100000,12208:100000,5394:100000
-	shop	idROCO::idRO_conz2	-1,13536:150000,12909:200000,14614:200000,12646:200000,12214:200000,13533:200000,12883:250000,14545:250000,12412:250000,13857:200000,13534:350000,13858:350000,14538:400000,13718:500000,13720:500000,17126:500000,13710:750000

//============================================================
